name: Taikou Risshiden / 太閤立志伝
description: "Taikou Risshiden" was released in 1992. The game revolves around the rise of Hideyoshi Toyotomi during the Warring States period of Japan. Players enjoy the story of Hideyoshi's life and his struggles as he rose from a common foot soldier to become the Chief Adviser to the Emperor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 22KHz/16bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 22KHz/16bit
